original: Bergher, Ive Karl Einar, läroverksadjunkt, Karlskrona, f. 23/2/91 i Kors-berga, Jönköp. 1. — Stud:ex. i Linköp. 10, fil. mag. i Upps. 16, provår v. norra latin i Sthlm 20-21. Stud :res. t. Tyskl. 11, 21 o. 27, Engl. 26, 33 o. 34. Lär. v. Solbacka lärov. 17-20, vik. adj. v. norra latin 21, i Kalmar 21-22, Halmstad 22, dito samt e. lär. v. olika läroanst. i Sthlm 23-35, timlär. v. Sthlms borgarsk. 20-21 o. 23-30 samt förest, f. dess språklinje 31-35, adj. « eng. o. franska v. Karlskrona h. a. i. sed. 34.
translated: Bergher, Ive Karl Einar, high school teacher, Karlskrona, born February 23, 1891 in Kors-berga, Jönköping county. He graduated from high school in Linköping in 1910 and received a Bachelor of Arts degree in Uppsala in 1916. He worked as a substitute teacher at Norra Latin in Stockholm during the academic year 1920-1921. He studied abroad in Germany in 1911, 1921, and 1927, England in 1926, and 1933-1934. He taught at Solbacka high school from 1917-1920, was a substitute teacher at Norra Latin in 1921, and taught in Kalmar in 1921-1922 and Halmstad in 1922. He subsequently worked as a high school teacher at various schools in Stockholm from 1923-1935 and taught evening classes at Stockholm's borgarskola from 1920-1921 and 1923-1930. He was also in charge of the school's language program from 1931-1935. He worked as a high school teacher of English and French in Karlskrona from 1934 onwards and got married in 19xx.
